dcterms:creator: I. V. Chilingarian
P. Di Matteo
F. Combes
A. L. Melchior
B. Semelin
dcterms:description: GalMer is a N-body + SPH galaxy merger simulation database that provides a range of simulations for interacting galaxy pairs, allowing for the study of their dynamics and morphology based on various parameters such as mass ratios and inclinations.
dcterms:title: GALMER

dcterms:description: The Sloan Digital Sky Survey (SDSS) provides a comprehensive dataset of astronomical images and spectra, which can be used for various analyses including the study of galaxy interactions.
dcterms:title: Sloan Digital Sky Survey (SDSS)

dcterms:description: HyperLEDA is a database for galaxies and cosmology that provides detailed information on individual galaxies, including their inclinations and position angles, which can be used in the analysis of interacting galaxy pairs.
dcterms:title: HyperLEDA
